item.description:
After last week, it's definitely time for a beer. Slumbrew is launching their new Imperial Red Ale, the Lobsta Killah this Wednesday at 6:00pm at the Dubliner Pub, and we'll be there!New beer, new bar: two birds, one stone. They'll have a Lobster Mac & Cheese special, and I'm sure there will be some Slumbrew Gear floating around! Caitlin Jewell - founder of Slumbrew - will be there as well, telling the story of the new beer!

Bring some friends of your own, or don't hesitate to come by yourself! This will be a great event for relaxing and meeting some new people over a few beers.

I will try to save some space for our meetup group, but if you can't find us just text me at 909-276-7424 and I'll help!
item.how_to_find_us: Text me at 909-276-7424 and I will help you find the group!
item.name: Slumbrew Lobsta Killah Imperial Red Launch Party at the new Dubliner Pub
